GameRules.description: In this game the computer randomly chooses a 4-digit number and the player has to guess what those 4 digits are. During the course of the game the player will be notified if the guess was correct or how close he is to guessing the number.
GameRules.rules: The two ways of knowing how close the player is to guessing the number are: Bull - the digit and the position are correct Cow - the digit is correct but the position is not If there are no Bulls and Cows then everything is wrong
